subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ma|t=not}} + [[w:Proto-Sino-Tibetan|Proto-Sino-Tibetan]] terminative suffix *-ŋ. Cognate with {{och-l|忘|to forget}}, {{och-l|罔|to not have}}, {{och-l|荒|to waste (land, time)}} and {{och-l|喪|to lose}}.
